page.title: 18Small Industries, Stirling
page.content:
There are quite a few small industries in{Raploch}although it is a small area. There is an Industrial Estate made up of{9 units.}Some are contractors for builders, decorators, tyre centre, B.P. oil depot, and others. There are 2 main industries in Drip Road, they are an{Icecream}and {Lemonade}factory.
The icecream business is a family concern. They make all flavours of icecream and have won an award for their work. They have 10 vans on the road and 1 caravan, and travel in and around the Stirling area.
The lemonade factory has{30 employees. They make a variety of flavours. They use their lorries to deliver lemonade to shops, cafes, and they also do home deliveries when required.
